org.neon_toolkit.registry.api.change
Class ChangeManagement

java.lang.Object
  org.neon_toolkit.registry.api.change.ChangeManagement

public class ChangeManagement
extends java.lang.Object

The class ChangeManager provides the methods to support the change support

Version:
2.0, March 2008
Author:
Raul Palma

Constructor Detail

ChangeManagement

public ChangeManagement()
Method Detail

register

public java.lang.String register(OMVChange o)
Register a new change into Oyster2 registry.

Parameters:
o - is the OMVChange object representing the change that will be registered. This method creates the whole trace, update the log and change specification and the corresponding workflow actions if workflow is enabled.

register

public void register(OMVLog o)
Register a new change log into Oyster2 registry.

Parameters:
o - is the OMVLog object representing the log that will be registered. NOTE: This method is called within the change management implementation, it should not be called directly.

register

public void register(OMVChangeSpecification o)
Register a new change specification into Oyster2 registry.

Parameters:
o - is the OMVChangeSpecification object that will be registered.

replace

public void replace(OMVChange o)
Replaces a new change into Oyster2 registry.

Parameters:
o - is the OMVChange object representing the change that will be replaced (i.e. this method is implemented as a merge) NOTE: This method should be called within the change management implementation, it should not be called directly.

replace

public void replace(OMVLog o)
Replaces the log into Oyster2 registry.

Parameters:
o - is the OMVLog object representing the log that will be replaced NOTE: This method is called within the change management implementation, it should not be called directly.

replace

public void replace(OMVChangeSpecification o)
Replaces the change specification object in Oyster

Parameters:
o - is the OMVChangeSpecification object that will be replaced. This method is implemented as a merge

remove

public void remove(OMVChange o)
Removes a change from Oyster2 registry.

Parameters:
o - is the OMVChange object representing the change that will be removed. NOTE: This method is called within the change management implementation, it should not be called directly.

remove

public void remove(OMVLog o)
Removes a Log from Oyster2 registry.

Parameters:
o - is the OMVLog object representing the log that will be removed. NOTE: This method is called within the change management implementation, it should not be called directly.

remove

public void remove(OMVChangeSpecification o)
Removes a changeSpecification from Oyster2 registry and all its related changes, log, and if available workflow information i.e. removes all change information from the ontology specified by the change specification

Parameters:
o - is the OMVChangeSpecification object

Gets the entity state

Parameters:
o - is the ontology for which we want to get the entity state
entityURI - is the URI of the target entity
Returns:
the entity state.

Get the ontologies that are being tracked by the local peer independently if changes are already available

Returns:
The set of the ontologies

isTracked

public boolean isTracked(OMVOntology o)
Verify if an ontology has been registered to track its changes

Parameters:
o - is the OMVOntology to check

getTrackedChanges

public java.util.List<OMVChange> getTrackedChanges(OMVOntology o,
                                                   org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.Ontology registry,
                                                   java.lang.String fromChange)
Search Oyster2 registry to retrieve all available changes for a specific ontology in historical order, starting with the specified change.

Parameters:
o - is the specified ontology
fromChange - is the starting point in the change history. If not specified (i.e. fromChange=null) this method returns the complete history
Returns:
The list of OMVChanges objects representing the ontology changes.

getTrackedChanges

public java.util.Set<OMVChange> getTrackedChanges(OMVOntology o,
                                                  OMVChange c,
                                                  org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.Ontology registry,
                                                  java.lang.String fromChange)
Search Oyster2 registry to retrieve changes of specific kind for a specific ontology.

Parameters:
o - is the specified ontology.
c - is the kind of ontology change Use predefined classes of the API i.e. new OMVEntityChange().
fromChange - is the starting point in the change history. If not specified (i.e. fromChange=null) this method returns the complete history
Returns:
The set of OMVChanges objects representing the ontology changes.

getTrackedChangesSet

public java.util.Set<OMVChange> getTrackedChangesSet(OMVOntology o,
                                                     org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.Ontology registry)
Search Oyster2 registry to retrieve all available changes for a specific ontology without any order

Parameters:
o - is the specified ontology
Returns:
The set of OMVChanges objects representing the ontology changes.

getTrackedOntologies

public java.util.Set<OMVOntology> getTrackedOntologies()
Search Oyster2 registry to retrieve all ontologies with change history.

Returns:
The set of OMVOntology objects

Parameters:

isHistoryOlder

public boolean isHistoryOlder(OMVOntology o,
                              org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.Ontology registry1,
                              org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.Ontology registry2)
Compares if change history in registry is older than in registry2

Parameters:
o - is the ontology from which we want to compare change history
registry1 - is the registry that will be compared
registry2 - is the registry that will be used as reference
Returns:
true/false
